alert.note: Alert for Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 12 at 7:01PM CDT until May 17 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of north central North Dakota, including the following county, Ward. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 700 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Between 1.5 and 2 inches of rain have fallen in the Minot area. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 1.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Minot.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
